Cody & Victoria

The Wedding

December 16th - 19th, 2016

Our Story

Tina and Cody - we first met on PlentyOfFish.com (unfortunately, we were not paid to advertise this)
Tina - I thought online dating was shady, but hey, desperate times call for desperate measures.
Cody - Wow, dang babe.... I knew I could find a quality African woman online
Tina - Mail order bride status. All I said to him was "Hey", cause I honeslty didn't know if he would reply. He looked like a down to earth model, my very own Ken doll, plus he had a picture of him with his grandma at his graduation, so at least he was educated.
Cody - Lucky for me, she is obsessed with white boys, so I asked her out on a date.
Tina - Yup, and 45 minutes before the date, you called and bailed. So I decied to go alone. I ain't no punk.
Cody - When I found out you went downtown anyway, I felt terrible and decided to drive out anyway to meet you.
Tina - blah blah blah, and then we got engaged!

The What

We rented a huge cabin for the weekend of December 16th - 19th to spend time with family and friends.

Join us for a weekend of fun with plans to include put-put golf, bowling, games, food, and the ceremony!

The Where

The Big Moose Lodge

Check out their website

Sevierville, TN 37863

Due to the limit bedrooms, there will be assigned sleeping arrangements. If you find your assigned sleeping arrangement uncomfortable, there are various hotels in the area within a short drive to the cabin.
